name: 3D.City - Build Your Dream City !
description:
No ads, no in-app purchases, just the Game .

Welcome to your new city , Mayor .
The people are in urgent need of your help. It's up to you to build your city , jump-start the economy and make the people happy! Build you city and make it prosper !

Everything from building the city, the economy, taxes, housing, infrastructure and roads, police , power , industry and many more are under your control.

It's up to you to make the city flourish ! Housing, pollution, unemployment and tax rates are some of the issues you will have to tackle in the quest to make your city prosper !

Build you city and make it prosper !
